# Test

**Structure**

A type representing a test or suite.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Test
```

## Overview

An instance of this type may represent:

- A type containing zero or more tests (i.e. a *test suite*);
- An individual test function (possibly contained within a type); or
- A test function parameterized over one or more sequences of inputs.

Two instances of this type are considered to be equal if the values of their `Test/id-swift.property` properties are equal.

## Structures

- **Test.Case**: A single test case from a parameterized [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/Test].

## Instance Properties

- **associatedBugs**: The set of bugs associated with this test.
- **comments**: The complete set of comments about this test from all of its traits.
- **displayName**: The customized display name of this instance, if specified.
- **isParameterized**: Whether or not this test is parameterized.
- **isSuite**: Whether or not this instance is a test suite containing other tests.
- **name**: The name of this instance.
- **sourceLocation**: The source location of this test.
- **tags**: The complete, unique set of tags associated with this test.
- **timeLimit**: The maximum amount of time this test’s cases may run for.
- **traits**: The set of traits added to this instance when it was initialized.

## Type Properties

- **current**: The test that is running on the current task, if any.

## Essentials

- **Defining test functions**: Define a test function to validate that code is working correctly.
- **Organizing test functions with suite types**: Organize tests into test suites.
- **Migrating a test from XCTest**: Migrate an existing test method or test class written using XCTest.
- **Test(_:_:)**: Declare a test.
- **Suite(_:_:)**: Declare a test suite.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Identifiable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
